title: Maven Batch Executor
description: Execute Maven goals using the batch invoker with session context preservation

goals.description: Maven goals to execute in batch (e.g., ['compile', 'org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-surefire-plugin:test'])

projectRoot.description: Project root directory relative to workspace root

mavenPluginPath.description: Path to the Maven plugin directory containing the batch executor

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for Maven execution

outputFile.description: Optional file to write execution results

failOnError.description: Fail the executor if any Maven goal fails
